name: Spiritual King of Ignition, Valnout
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Choose one of your [Stand] rear-guards, and it gets "[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]: At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [Stand] this unit." until end of turn. If you did not choose a card, draw a card, choose up to one unit card from your hand, and call it to (RC).
flavor: O' flame of miracles, progenitor of innovation. Bestow upon me immeasurable power.

name: Spiritual King of Aquatics, Idosfaro
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Choose a card from your drop, put it into hand, choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.
flavor: O' water of miracles, essence of all there is to be. Give unto me limitless power.

name: Forbidoll Surrogate
effect: Regalis Piece(You may only have one Regalis Piece in your deck, and use it a total of one time in a fight)Search your deck or drop for up to a total of two grade 3 or 4 unit cards with different card names and reveal them, call all revealed grade 3 cards to (RC), and put all revealed grade 4 cards into hand. If you searched the deck, shuffle the deck. (You may also search for only one card)
flavor: I'll help thread on any kind of soul… on this substitute.

name: Evergreen Transphere
effect: Regalis Piece(You may only have one Regalis Piece in your deck, and use it a total of one time in a fight)Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]!Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +25000 until end of that battle. Choose one of your vanguards, and it gets "[CONT](VC):All of your opponent's [Power] 100 Million or greater units get [Critical] -1." until end of turn.
flavor: May those who embark on a journey to the far horizons, do so with the blessings of the sprites.

name: Forcember Dragon, Red Exert Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your opponent's drive check or damage check revealed a trigger unit this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +10000.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and perform all of the following.・Choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it. If you did not retire a card, draw a card.・[COST][Remove a [Over] trigger from drop], and this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: To live is to fight. Keep the flame of life ablaze.

name: Causality Dragon, Crucial Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your opponent's drive check or damage check revealed a trigger unit this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +10000.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks a vanguard while not boosted, [COST][put another rear-guard in the same column as this unit into soul], and perform all of the following.・Choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.・[COST][Remove a [Over] trigger from drop], and your opponent cannot call grade 1 or greater cards from hand to (GC) until end of that battle.
flavor: All of your fates are already within my grasp.

name: Elbard X-striker
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your opponent's drive check or damage check revealed a trigger unit this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +10000.[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], and perform all of the following.・This unit gets "Boost" and [Power] +2000 until end of turn.・[COST][Remove a [Over] trigger from drop], and this unit gets "[CONT]Back Row (RC):All of your front row units get [Power] +5000." until end of turn.
flavor: Grab hold of victory and keep the peace. That is our unwavering mission!

name: Divine Knight of Deeply-laid Strategems, Sajess
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your opponent's drive check or damage check revealed a trigger unit this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +10000.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks, look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top of the deck or into soul, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and perform all of the following.・Choose one of your opponent's [Power] 14000 or greater vanguards, and increase this unit's [Power] by that unit's [Power] until end of that battle.・[COST][Remove a [Over] trigger from drop], choose one of your other front row units, and it gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.
flavor: Don’t stop thinking. Beyond your thoughts lies tomorrow.

name: Yearnful Flower Maiden, Florence
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your opponent's drive check or damage check revealed a trigger unit this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +10000.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks, [COST][discard the top two cards of the deck], and perform all of the following.・[Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If all of the cards discarded for this cost are not normal units, it gets [Power] +15000 instead of +5000.・[COST][Remove a [Over] trigger from drop], choose a unit card from your drop, and put it into hand.
flavor: Don't wait! Your heart decides when to sprout!

name: Holy Egg Festival Praxis Committee Chief, Clarissa
effect: DressUp - "Earnescorrect Leader, Clarissa" (During this fight, this card is also regarded as the specified card)[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:If you persona rode this turn, this cost may be paid with "[Soul-Blast 1]". [COST][Discard a grade 3 card with "Clarissa" in its card name from hand], search your deck or drop for up to one "Aim to be the Strongest Idol!", reveal it and put it into hand, and if you searched the deck, shuffle the deck.[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When this unit's attack hits, draw two cards, and all of your rear-guards with "Earnescorrect" in their card names get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: We'll be the ones to lead this Holy Egg Festival to its success!

name: Holy-angel of Blessings, Alestiel
effect: DressUp - "Archangel of Twin Wings, Alestiel" (During this fight, this card is also regarded as the specified card)[AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your main phase, choose a card from your bind zone, put it into hand, and bind the top card of the deck.Black Wings - [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from hand], search your deck for up to one card with the Black Wings ability, call it to (RC), and shuffle the deck.White Wings - [AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], search your deck or hand for up to one card with original card name "Archangel of Twin Wings, Alestiel", ride it as [Stand], and it gets drive -1 until end of turn. If you searched the deck, shuffle the deck.
flavor: The Twin Wings of Black and White celebrate the birth of a new life.

name: Sing with Me, Loronerol
effect: DressUp - "Heartfelt Song, Loronerol" (During this fight, this card is also regarded as the specified card)[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 3 or less unit card from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle the deck.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, choose up to one face up Song from your order zone, and sing it. If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Soul-Blast 1] grade 3 card with "Loronerol" in its card name], until end of that battle, this unit gets drive +1, and your opponent cannot call sentinels from hand to (GC).
flavor: Today's the parade! Let's all have fun and sing together~♪

name: Festimagica, Wilista
effect: DressUp - "Prismagica, Wilista" (During this fight, this card is also regarded as the specified card)[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), [COST][discard a card from hand], choose a Gem card from your soul or drop, and put it into hand.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1] Gem card], and perform all of the following according to the card name of the card [Soul-Blast] for this cost.・"Everlasting Sapphire" - Look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to two unit cards from among them, call them to (RC), and shuffle the deck.・"Truehearted Ruby" - This unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.
flavor: I'll show you that even today, I'm the brightest of them all!

name: Rondo of Plenilune, Feltyrosa
effect: DressUp - "Rondo of Eventide Moon, Feltyrosa" (During this fight, this card is also regarded as the specified card)[CONT](VC): During your turn, if your soul has a grade 3 card with "Feltyrosa" in its card name, all of your front row <Ghost>  get [Power] +10000.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of turn, this unit gets "[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When your drive check reveals a <Ghost>  normal unit or a grade 3 card with "Feltyrosa" in its card name, you may call that card to an open (RC). If you called a card, this unit gets drive +1 until end of that battle." twice.
flavor: Isn't it beautiful like that round, floating moon?Oh my. Not me…... This little one over here.

name: Moon-nestling Fantasia, Adelheid
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your opponent's drive check or damage check revealed a trigger unit this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +10000.[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked while boosted, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and perform all of the following.・Choose one of your other rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and return it to hand.・[COST][Remove a [Over] trigger from drop], choose up to one unit card with grade less than or equal to your vanguard from your hand, and call it to (RC).
flavor: My dearest sister――I only wish to see what you see.

name: What Color is Your Wish, Valsheblan
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your ride phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & put this card on the bottom of the deck], and draw a card.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets "[CONT](VC):All of your front row units get [Power] +5000." until end of turn.
flavor: Would you like one too? An egg filled with everyone's hopes and wishes.

name: Go Go Street! Cooray
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by the ability of your vanguard with "Lilfa" or "Michu" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], [Counter-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The festival is just getting started!!

name: Earnescorrect Follower, Neccela
effect: [ACT](RC)/Hand:If you have a vanguard with "Clarissa" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this card into soul], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets "[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if you played "Aim to be the Strongest Idol!" this turn, choose one of your rear-guards, and [Stand] it." until end of turn.
flavor: It's my absolute honor to be able to do this with everyone!

name: Clear Stream, Marilou
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your order zone has two or more face down cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000.[AUTO]:If you persona rode this turn, this cost may be paid with "[Soul-Blast 1]". When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][put a card from hand into soul], search your deck for up to one Song card, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck.
flavor: And now~! Let's move on to the next song♪

name: Enfolding Fondness, Elyliel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Alestiel" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card from your bind zone, and put it into hand. If you put a card into hand, bind the top card of the deck.Black Wings - [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose an attacking unit, and it gets [Power] -5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Enfold your precious thoughts and wishes in these warm and tender wings.

name: Full Marks for Exhilarating Energy, Trixie
effect: [CONT](RC):If you played a Gem order this turn, and your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Wilista" in its card name, [COST][put a card from hand into soul], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to two grade 3 cards with "Wilista" in their different original card names from among them, reveal them and put them into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you did not reveal any cards, draw a card.
flavor: Let's go glittering and sparkling~!

name: Traumerei of Grazing Hands, Roswitha
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) other than from hand, if you have a vanguard with "Feltyrosa" in its card name, [Stand] all of your rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, you may have this unit get [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. If you do, at the end of that battle, put this unit on the bottom of the deck.
flavor: The warmth at the tip of those intertwined fingers invites you into a never-ending dream

name: Find It Un・Deux・Trois, Lalpacana
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to two of your other rear-guards, return them to hand, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: I heard that there's but one magical egg mixed in here!

name: Emotive Emotion, Halpha
effect: Powerful - [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your soul has no cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000.[AUTO](RC):When this unit is chosen by the ability of your vanguard with "Herminia" or "Haseritt" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: Oh~♡ To be able to take in my favorites at this distance is sending me to heaven~♡

name: Together with You, Serafiel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose a grade 3 card with "Alestiel" in its card name from your drop, and put it on the bottom of the deck.White Wings - [AUTO]Back Row (RC):When your unit with "Alestiel" in its card name is placed on (VC) during your battle phase, [Stand] this unit.
flavor: Ally, would you… like to walk around the stalls with me after this?

name: Coiling Parade, Shibanu
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Loronerol" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to two grade 3 cards with "Loronerol" in their different original card names from among them, reveal them and put them into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you did not reveal any cards, draw a card.
flavor: I found Loro~! Let's play, let's play~!

name: Night Sky Searing Divertimento, Ortrud
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if you have a vanguard with "Feltyrosa" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put another rear-guard in the same column as this unit into soul], and draw a card.
flavor: The glittering festival night is their sole stage.

name: Do My Airy Best, Aynia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by a card's ability, if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Kyouka" or "Luticia" in its card name, [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Oh…...! I'll do my best too…...!

name: An Egg Relay Full of Smiles! Juliana
effect: Friend - [CONT](RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends".[AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Fortia" or "Mediell" in its card name, choose one of your other "Friends", and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The joy is greater when we share our enjoyment with others.

name: Perfect Tailoring, Crokel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one card with the DressUp ability from among them, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck.
flavor: Your heart flutters as your arms slip through the sleeves of the "special" outfit that's so different from usual.

name: Earnescorrect Follower, Payton
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand, if you have a vanguard with "Clarissa" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a grade 2 or less card with "Earnescorrect" in its card name not named "Earnescorrect Follower, Payton" from your drop, and you may put it into hand. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: I-I was supposed to be a stagehand…...!

name: Crossing Illumirays
effect: [CONT]: During this fight, this card is also regarded as "Truehearted Ruby" and "Everlasting Sapphire".Play this if you have a vanguard with "Wilista" in its card name!Put this card into soul, draw a card, choose one of your vanguards, until end of turn, it gets [Power] +5000, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, it gets "[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1] grade 3 card with "Wilista" in its card name], choose one of your rear-guards, and [Stand] it.". You cannot play orders this turn.
flavor: Red and blue――they are the unwavering, boundless shape of dreams.

name: Stealth Dragon, Madowazu
flavor: A dispassionate blade that buries its enemies without hesitation.

name: Stealth Dragon, Midaregumo
flavor: Drown into the clouds, and sink to death.

name: Stealth Dragon, Yamitaguri
flavor: Bwoom.

name: Stealth Dragon, Shikintan
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: The secret medicine of the village removes wounds, pain... even fear.

name: Demonic Stone Dragon, Jewelneel
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, [Soul-Charge 1].[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a unit with "Drajeweled" in its card name, [Soul-Charge 1], and if your soul has three or more cards with different grades, draw a card.
flavor: An overwhelming wave of demonic power that prevents anyone from coming near…

name: Jewel Core Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Demonic Stone Dragon, Jewelneel", call this card to (RC).[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks or boosts, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, put this unit into soul. (This effect is mandatory)
flavor: By consuming crystals of demonic power, the dragon expands its power.

name: Jewelias Dracokid
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Since birth, the dragon holds the qualifications to become strong.

name: Swanky Enthraller
flavor: Dancing frivolously, a single meteor steals your gaze.

name: Silky Sky Actress
flavor: The large flowers blooming in the night sky will be surrounded by applause again this evening.

name: Intrepid Spinner
flavor: I'm going to spin a few more than usual~!

name: Gambling Juggler
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: Without the thrill, it wouldn't be any fun at all, would it?

name: Chain-like Cluster
flavor: The overwhelming mass inflicts an irreversible alteration.

name: Light-flux Bowman, Luminoflux
flavor: If I don't shoot it down here, no one will be able to sleep in peace!

name: Analysis Thrashing, Brightrim
flavor: It's brittle. Upgrade the materials.

name: Waving Hand of Vacuum Discharge
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: Come over here. I'll fix you right up!

name: Knight of Ardent Light, Youth
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a unit with the [RevolDress] ability, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a grade 2 or greater card from your drop, and put it into hand.[AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit is boosted, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The light from the skies. I used to believe that it was the path that knights should follow.

name: Determined to Break Away, Youth
effect: [CONT](VC/RC):During the battle this unit attacked, this unit gets [Power] +2000.[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Knight of Ardent Light, Youth", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top three cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Youthberk" in its card name from among them and reveal it and put it into hand, or choose up to one grade 2 or less unit card from among them and call it to (RC), and put the rest on the bottom of the deck in any order.
flavor: I need to become stronger so that I can create a peaceful world!

name: Youth Following in Footsteps, Youth
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: It is his dream to stand alongside the proud knight that is his father.

name: Knight of Orderly Bow, Llyvarch
flavor: If a single shot doesn't pierce it, just fire repeatedly.

name: Accumulation Sage
flavor: Lucky? Not at all. This outcome is inevitable.

name: Shargaon
flavor: Together with its master, it heads straight for the enemy!

name: Knight of Clarion Strings, Ricula
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: The angel's harp plays a soothing melody that unravels the heart.

name: Brilliant Tune, Rektina
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a unit with "Lianorn" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a grade 1 or less card from your drop, and call it to (RC).[CONT]RC:If your back row has three or more rear-guards, this unit gets "Boost".
flavor: Elegant and pure. Her performance mesmerizes everyone.

name: Budding of Pleasant Sounds, Gracia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Brilliant Tune, Rektina", you may call this card to (RC).[CONT]RC: During the battle this unit boosted a vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Move the baton to the beat of your heart.

name: Announcing Wind of Spring, Corphie
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Let's give it our all with today's parade too!

name: Tear Knight, Costas
flavor: You'll perish right here! In the depths of this sea!!

name: Scattered Strike Brave Shooter
flavor: With how hard we're driving it in, they can't complain, right?

name: Tear Knight, Kaikilia
flavor: With everything staked on one great slash, the stalemate is overturned.

name: Battle Siren, Dorcea
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: As long as the singing voices echo in the great sea, justice will not be broken.

name: Fluffy Lady, Godelieve
flavor: Your ♡ is on the verge of falling to the soft and gentle beating of the waves.

name: Answerer Encore, Daatje
flavor: All of you! Cry and rejoice! It's time for the encore!!

name: Pop Out Front Line, Gisela
flavor: Whoo~! Yay♪

name: Diva of Ataraxia, Georgina
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: Now then, let me sing for you with the weary face.

name: Forcember Dragon, Red Exert Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your opponent's drive check or damage check revealed a trigger unit this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +10000.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and perform all of the following.・Choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it. If you did not retire a card, draw a card.・[COST][Remove a [Over] trigger from drop], and this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of that battle.

name: Causality Dragon, Crucial Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your opponent's drive check or damage check revealed a trigger unit this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +10000.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks a vanguard while not boosted, [COST][put another rear-guard in the same column as this unit into soul], and perform all of the following.・Choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.・[COST][Remove a [Over] trigger from drop], and your opponent cannot call grade 1 or greater cards from hand to (GC) until end of that battle.

effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your opponent's drive check or damage check revealed a trigger unit this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +10000.[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], and perform all of the following.・This unit gets "Boost" and [Power] +2000 until end of turn.・[COST][Remove a [Over] trigger from drop], and this unit gets "[CONT]Back Row (RC):All of your front row units get [Power] +5000." until end of turn.

name: Divine Knight of Deeply-laid Strategems, Sajess
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your opponent's drive check or damage check revealed a trigger unit this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +10000.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks, look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top of the deck or into soul, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and perform all of the following.・Choose one of your opponent's [Power] 14000 or greater vanguards, and increase this unit's [Power] by that unit's [Power] until end of that battle.・[COST][Remove a [Over] trigger from drop], choose one of your other front row units, and it gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.

effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your opponent's drive check or damage check revealed a trigger unit this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +10000.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks, [COST][discard the top two cards of the deck], and perform all of the following.・[Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. [COST][Discard a grade 3 card with "Clarissa" in its card name from hand], search your deck or drop for up to one "Aim to be the Strongest Idol!", reveal it and put it into hand, and if you searched the deck, shuffle the deck.[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When this unit's attack hits, draw two cards, and all of your rear-guards with "Earnescorrect" in their card names get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

If you searched the deck, shuffle the deck.

name: Sing with Me, Loronerol
effect: DressUp - "Heartfelt Song, Loronerol"[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 3 or less unit card from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle the deck.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, choose up to one face up Song from your order zone, and sing it. If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Soul-Blast 1] grade 3 card with "Loronerol" in its card name], until end of that battle, this unit gets drive +1, and your opponent cannot call sentinels from hand to (GC).

name: Festimagica, Wilista
effect: DressUp - "Prismagica, Wilista"[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), [COST][discard a card from hand], choose a Gem card from your soul or drop, and put it into hand.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1] Gem card], and perform all of the following according to the card name of the card [Soul-Blast] for this cost.・"Everlasting Sapphire" - Look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to two unit cards from among them, call them to (RC), and shuffle the deck.・"Truehearted Ruby" - This unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.

name: Rondo of Plenilune, Feltyrosa
effect: DressUp - "Rondo of Eventide Moon, Feltyrosa"[CONT](VC): During your turn, if your soul has a grade 3 card with "Feltyrosa" in its card name, all of your front row <Ghost>  get [Power] +10000.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of turn, this unit gets "[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When your drive check reveals a <Ghost>  normal unit or a grade 3 card with "Feltyrosa" in its card name, you may call that card to an open (RC). If you called a card, this unit gets drive +1 until end of that battle." twice.

name: Moon-nestling Fantasia, Adelheid
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your opponent's drive check or damage check revealed a trigger unit this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +10000.[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked while boosted, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and perform all of the following.・Choose one of your other rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and return it to hand.・[COST][Remove a [Over] trigger from drop], choose up to one unit card with grade less than or equal to your vanguard from your hand, and call it to (RC).

name: What Color is Your Wish, Valsheblan
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your ride phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & put this card on the bottom of the deck], and draw a card.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets "[CONT](VC):All of your front row units get [Power] +5000." until end of turn.

name: Vairina Arcs
effect: [overDress] - "Trickstar" (You may place it by stacking it on the specified unit instead of normal calling it to (RC))[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if it [overDress], [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw two cards, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Reach your hand out! Towards the possibilities no one has ever seen!

name: Stealth Dragon, Fushimachi Madoka
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your opponent's drop has four or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +2000/[Shield] +5000. Then, if it has eight or more cards, this unit gets [Shield] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: The waning moon has risen fully. It is our time now.

name: Twin Buckler Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from hand, and discard it.
flavor: Thunder and flames. Wield them both skillfully and repel the calamity.

name: Blaze Maiden, Parama
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Rino! Even if it's tough, it's no reason to cry and whine!

name: Burning Flail Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Just being crushed is not going to be the end of this.

name: Flare Veil Dragon
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: The crimson wings burn off all kinds of malice.

name: Upward Acrobat, Marjorie
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks, If you are in "Final Rush", [COST][put another rear-guard into soul], draw a card, [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Here is this evening's grand pinnacle! I'll charm you to the fullest!

name: Steam Battler, Gungnram
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [Soul-Charge 1].[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 3], and draw a card.
flavor: Your very existence will be erased. We can't leave any trace of you in history after all.

name: Friend of the Netherworld, Ling
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), look at the top two cards of your deck, choose a card from among them, put it into soul, and put the rest on the bottom of the deck.
flavor: With everyone here, I don't have time to feel lonely.

name: Recusal Hate Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from hand, and discard it.
flavor: Ideals alone are meaningless. Justice without power has no worth.

name: Diabolos Girls, Natalia
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: We'll make the play, we're gonna score! Our dynamic will take back more~!

name: Stem Deviate Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Piercing through time, the bullet to confirm destruction is fired.

name: Rouse Wildmaster, Riley
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Don't touch! Okay? Or you'd be eaten.

name: Detonation Monster, Bobalmine
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if your order zone has a set order, [COST][put this unit into soul], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: Research on how to make good use of blast waves is ongoing.

name: Ravenous Monster, Marunorm
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a set order card from hand], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: It sated its hunger for a bit. But immediately got hungry again.

name: Violate Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from hand, and discard it.
flavor: It instinctively rejects the foreign object.

name: Cardinal Draco, Enpyro
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Twisting causality. That you may not do as you please.

name: Patrol Robo, Dekarcop
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Please leave this place to me!!

name: Ameliorate Connector
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Replacement completed. Conductivity greatly increased.

name: Knight of War Damage, Fosado
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.[AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [Counter-Charge 1]/[Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: There is no chain in this world that can tether him.

name: Knight of Piercing, Cadwalla
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, if you have four or more units, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], look at the top three cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 2 or greater unit card from among them, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you did not reveal a card, draw a card.
flavor: Is the duty of a knight to protect the law? No! It is to protect the lives of the people!

name: Painkiller Angel
effect: [AUTO]RC:At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], and draw a card.
flavor: There's no need to worry. It'll be over after a small prick.

name: Aegismare Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from hand, and discard it.
flavor: This pain… I shall take on all of it.

name: Bard of Heavenly Song, Alpacc
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: In tough times, the heroic timbre supports the heart.

name: Blade Feather Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: These wings are not just for flying.

name: Protection Magic, Prorobi
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: I see. Let's make it a little firmer here.

name: Clapping Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on a front row (RC) from hand, if your back row has three or more units, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Clap your hands according to the rhythm! This is also music!

name: Maiden of Deep Impression, Urjula
effect: [CONT](RC):When you would move or swap rear-guards during your main phase, you can also move it within the same row.[CONT](RC):Your units in front of this unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects.
flavor: The beautiful garden that you created. Replant it as your heart wishes.

name: Planar Prevent Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from hand, and discard it.
flavor: I'll definitely protect them. They are lives that finally sprouted after all.

name: Frenzied Heiress
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Insanity can sometimes be a weapon.

name: Aspiring Maiden, Alana
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Here! One more crown as a present♪

name: Serene Maiden, Lena
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Isn't it such a great weather? Let's go on a walk~♪

name: Wild Intelligence
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Discard the top three cards of your deck, choose up to one card with grade less than or equal to your vanguard from your drop, and call it to (RC). If your vanguard is "Sylvan Horned Beast King, Magnolia", you may choose up to two cards instead of one.
flavor: In order to survive, join forces and pool your knowledge.

name: Beware of Overeating! Eileen
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a rear-guard, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of the deck.
flavor: Nom nom. This one's a hit.

name: Nocturne of Flickering Lambency, Judith
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from hand, and discard it.
flavor: My time with my dear sister cannot be interrupted even by deities.

name: Clear Shimmer, Aura
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits, [COST][retire this unit], search your deck for up to one order card, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck.
flavor: The world reflected in your eyes looks like it's shining bright.

name: Snowskip, Palvi
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Twirling excitedly, in the snow. With her favorite umbrella.

name: Precious Tune, Edwige
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: The singing voice that stirs the heart became ripples.

name: Transparent Snowy Night, Beretoi
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: With such a lovely night. It is a waste to be sleeping.

name: Dragritter, Halbe
effect: [CONT]:When this card would be discarded from hand for the cost of the ability of your vanguard with "Overlord" in its card name, it may be regarded as discarding two cards.[AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand for the cost of the ability of your vanguard with "Overlord" in its card name, you may call this card to a back row (RC). If you called a card, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Admiring the legend of the wind of the apocalypse, the young man became a fierce warrior.

name: Blaze Maiden, Shahdia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you have two or more normal units with "Blaze Maiden" in their card names, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Trickstar" or "Trickmoon", discard it, and shuffle the deck.
flavor: Alongside the voices of the maidens, the sprites dance.

name: Demonic Lord of Hades Blaze, Baphormedes
effect: [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][put two grade 3 rear-guards into soul], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle for every three grade 3 cards in your soul.[CONT](VC):This unit gets all of the following according to the number of grade 3 cards in your soul.・Three or more - All of your grade 3 units get [Shield] +5000, and "Boost".・Six or more - When your opponent would call cards from hand to (GC) for the battle this unit attacked, they must call three or more at the same time.
flavor: Rejoice. I shall allow you the honor of being burnt by the hellfire of the underworld.

name: Quaking Ripple Monster, Eledglema
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), reveal the top five cards of your deck, put all set orders from among them into the order zone, and shuffle the deck.[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, choose any number of set orders from your order zone, if you chose three or more cards with different card names, choose one of your rear-guards and [Stand] it, and if you chose five or more cards with different card names, [Stand] this unit, and this unit gets [Power] +10000/drive -2 until end of turn. Return all of the cards chosen from the order zone by this ability to the deck and shuffle it.
flavor: Love the flourishing civilization, then return it to nothingness.

name: Knight of Inheritance, Emmeline
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with "Blaster" in its card name from among them, call it to (RC), or reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you put a card into hand, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.[AUTO](RC):When your unit with "Blaster" in its card name attacks, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Even now, the brilliant pride remains within the hearts of the knights.

name: Empyrean Blue Dragon, Shelling Cannon Dragon
effect: [AUTO]Back Row Center (RC):At the beginning of your battle phase, if your vanguard is "Flagship Dragon, Flagburg Dragon", and your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of turn, this unit can attack from the back row, and gets [Power] +10000.[CONT]Back Row Center (RC):If you would move or swap this unit during your main phase, you can also move it within the same row.
flavor: Send this message to the flagship: "High firepower supporting fire shall commence now".

name: Relation Weaver, Petralka
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], reveal the top seven cards of your deck, if all of the revealed cards not named "Relation Weaver, Petralka" have different card names, choose up to one of the revealed cards, call it to (RC), and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. If you chose "Relation Weaver, Petralka", ride it as [Stand] instead of calling it to (RC), and it gets drive -1 until end of turn. Shuffle the deck. ([Power] +10000 when riding as well)
flavor: Each and every bond means the world, that's why we remain connected.

name: Hoppin' Stellar, Melty
effect: Friend - [CONT](RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, that unit and this unit become "Friends".[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) during your main phase, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to one card with grade less than or equal to your vanguard from your hand, and call it to (RC). If you called a card, draw a card.
flavor: Woke up perfectly! Today will be a good day!

name: Cooling Heart, Yuika
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other unit in the same column as this unit is placed, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted a rear-guard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of those boosted rear-guards, and return it to hand.
flavor: I'll handle the cleanup. Please rest early.
